pages.text: $(li)The Bamboo Jungle is a biome with a humid climate composed mostly of $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/bamboo)Bamboo$(/l) and Podzol and can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)Due to the climate of this place, you can find a lot vegetation, such as $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/bamboo)Bamboo$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/melon_slice)Melons$(/l), Bird of Paradise, Jungle and Oak Trees, Vines, $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/cocoa_beans)Cocoa$(/l) and Banana Bundles.

$(li)You can find animals like $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/leafcutter)Leftcutter Ants$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/neapolitan/plantain_spider)Plantain Spiders$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/panda)Panda Bears$(/l), $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/hummingbird)Hummingbirds$(/l), $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/parrot)Parrots$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/tiger)Tigers$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can search this biome by typing the words $(l)Bamboo Jungle$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
